Session start with Moti - Context refresh:
- Discussed reusable dropdown component creation
- Memory search shows recent ultra-modular refactoring work on tool-permission-dialog, user-widget-clipboard-text
- CSS refactoring best practices with four-tier @import orchestrator pattern
- Architectural pattern: orchestrator + dependency injection + micro-components
- Need to find specific details about the reusable dropdown we created

Memory fully restored about reusable Dropdown component:
- Created ultra-modular Dropdown with 8 files in shared/Dropdown/
- Orchestrator pattern: Main component 35 lines, coordinating trigger + menu + state
- useDropdownState hook (68 lines) with click-outside and Esc key support
- Sub-components: DropdownTrigger (18 lines), DropdownMenu (30 lines), DropdownItem (27 lines)
- Glassmorphic/metallic styling matching Sementix theme
- Built for upcoming conversation history feature
- Gotcha solved: setTimeout delay to prevent immediate close on trigger click
- Proper event listener cleanup in useEffect

User wants to add the reusable Dropdown component to the chat header, positioned on the right side of the tabs. Starting with exploration of the header structure to find the correct integration point.
Clarification: User wants dropdown on the same horizontal row as the chat tabs, positioned on the right side of the tabs container. Need to find TabRenderer to add the dropdown there.

Implementation approach:
1. Add history button creation method in TabRenderer (similar to createNewChatButton)
2. Modify render() to add history button with flexbox margin-left: auto to push it to right
3. Create CSS for history button matching tab styling
4. Add dropdown functionality with dummy conversation items for testing
